General.Name: Monitor Ventures Inc
General.Description: Monitor Ventures Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in the sale of CellCube energy storage systems in North America. The company was formerly known as American Vanadium Corp. and changed its name to Monitor Ventures Inc. in July 2017. Monitor Ventures Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: Three Bentall Centre, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7X 1J1
